column4: I'm running OOo3.0 on Ubuntu 9.04. I would like to make a "master copy" of OOo that includes the extensions and templates I've added to my personal copy.  Is there someway to do this in Ubuntu?  Some application that will meet my needs?  tnx
did you install the templates and extensions as a normal user, or as root?
i would think that if you didi it as a normal user then they will be stored somewhere in ~/.openoffice.org2/
so check if they are stored there and if they are do as sacarlson suggests
